Detailed Description

Packet that informs a module that a subscription is wanted.

Currently it is only possible to subscribe to all information from the type of module that this packet is sent to (for the specified maps).

) 
 

Create a new MapSubscriptionRequestPacket.

Parameters:
mapID One of the mapID:s in wantedMaps.
serviceID The service id.
wantedMaps A map with the id of the wanted maps in first and last update time in second.
unwantedMaps Vector of maps for which the subscription should stop.
